Class AnylineOcrConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.anyline.plugin.ocr.AnylineOcrConfig
      • at.nineyards.anyline.modules.ocr.AnylineOcrConfig
  • Deprecated. 
    As of release 10.1, replaced with AnylineOcrConfig. This class will be removed in November 2019.

public class AnylineOcrConfig
extends AnylineOcrConfig
